note.p: Birth: St Michael's parish, Barbados, West Indies (19 October 1749)
Education: Admitted Middle Temple (1767); Trinity College Oxford

Career: Called to the Bar (1777); practised in Grenada; Attorney General, Grenada; Solicitor General to the Prince of Wales (1783-his dismissal in 1792); Court of Chancery (1793); Attorney General (1806); MP for Arundel (1806-1819)
